archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.4.10d: d) individuals involved in the cause of the incident (e.g. through inappropriate, careless or criminal activity) are treated according to the organisation's crisis management process (e.g. by providing training, advice or warnings)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
